title: Skyland Istanbul
sub_title: A symbol of prestige rising in the heart of Istanbul
description: Developed by the esteemed Eroğlu Holding, this project is a landmark with its extremely high quality and central location directly on the TEM highway. Skyland has so much to offer from luxurious residential apartments to in-project commercial areas. Skyland provides its residents with a dream-like lifestyle.
highlight:
• Central location in Levent - Maslak
  • Gorgeous 360 views of Istanbul
  • On-site concept mall
  • High-end finishing
  • Beautifully designed luxurious units
  • Several top-of-the-line facilities

title: Alya 4 Mevsim
sub_title: A modern residence with utmost comfort and convenience
description: Developed by BOSS4 Group, this project is ideal for convenience and luxury at the same time. Located on the western side of Istanbul where Beylikdüzü meets Esenyurt. The project offers modern and comfortable units with many top-notch amenities.
highlight:
• Convenient location
  • High Return on Investment value
  • Located in one of the booming real estate districts
  • Close to the main 2 highways in Istanbul
  • A wide range of facilities
  • Modern interior/exterior architecture

title: Nişantaşı Koru
sub_title: Ultra-luxurious lifestyle at the most prestigious district
description: DAP Yapı’s most recent incredible project is about to make an appearance in the most fashionable neighborhood, Nişantaşı. This prestigious neighborhood is known for its various attractions and is considered one of the first places that come to mind when speaking of culture, art, and luxury shopping. Nişantaşı Koru is one of a kind project that redefines luxury, convenience, and elegance altogether.
highlight:
• Ideal location in the most fashionable district
  • Infinity pools on spacious terraces
  • Fascinating Bosphorus & Istanbul skyline views
  • Ultra-luxurious units
  • Top-notch facilities
  • Introducing green-living at the center of the city
  • Featuring healthy-home concept

title: AcarBlu
sub_title: Sophisticated apartments with captivating Bosphorus views
description: In terms of luxury, style, and elegance, AcarBlu- Acarkent project is the number one choice of many of the society’s elite community, celebrities, and businessmen as a place of residence. Additionally, Acarkent area stands out as the green neighbourhood that offers a life full of prestige and comfort. This district is perfect for investors who are looking for luxury.
highlight:
• Ready to move
  • Bosphorus views and compelling scenery of Istanbul
  • Close to the city center yet surrounded by greenery
  • Ultra-luxurious apartments
  • In-project facilities and mall
  • Elite society

title: Avrupa Konutları Yamanevler
description: The top-selling project on the Asian side of Istanbul. Avrupa Konutları Yamanevler is the first residential project of Artaş Group. With 1,604 units and multiple commercial areas, Avrupa Konutları Yamanevler was planned and designed for those who are looking for affordable luxury. This outstanding project is going to be completed within 3-phases, providing its residents a privileged life, by making their dream homes come true.
highlight:
• Ready to move
  • Ideal family-friendly environment
  • Convenient location
  • Affordable luxury
  • Various in-project facilities
  • Modern architecture

title: AcarVadi
sub_title: Spacious units surrounded by greenery yet close to the city center
description: Developed by Acarlar Group, offering an exceptionally privileged and modern life within nature. The project stands out for its spacious apartments in the center of the Asian side of Istanbul, Beykoz. The project area offers a healthy lifestyle and guarantees the utmost comfort and relaxation to its residents.
highlight:
• Ready to move
  • Villa-size apartments
  • Prestigious neighborhood
  • Low-rise buildings
  • A sense of security, privacy, and serenity
  • Green-living close to the city center
